name: Obstaroll
description:
Dodge trees, jump over lava, and climb up buildings as a ball in this fast paced runner/platformer for all ages.

Features:

-4 unique levels each with different themes and challenges.

-Simple and easily controllable.

-Ball moves forward automatically but can be sped up or slowed down to avoid certain death

-Physics which could be used for your advantage or lead your doom.

Special thanks to my friend Myca Villagracia for providing the voices you will hear throughout the game.
